com.googlecode.transloader.clone.reflect
Class FieldReflector

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.transloader.clone.reflect.FieldReflector

public final class FieldReflector
extends Object

A reflective wrapper around any object, exposing its fields.

Author:
Jeremy Wales

          The list of primitive wrapper Classes.

Field Detail

PRIMITIVE_WRAPPERS

public static final List PRIMITIVE_WRAPPERS
The list of primitive wrapper Classes.

Constructor Detail

FieldReflector

public FieldReflector(Object objectToWrap)
Wraps the given object in a new FieldReflector. Retrieves the ClassLoader of the wrapped object's Class as the one to use for all class loading.

Parameters:
objectToWrap - the object whose fields you want to expose.

FieldReflector

public FieldReflector(Object objectToWrap,
                      ClassLoader classLoaderToUse)
Wraps the given object in a new FieldReflector.

Parameters:
objectToWrap - the object whose fields you want to expose.
classLoaderToUse - the ClassLoader to use for loading Classes from FieldDescription.getDeclaringClassName()
Method Detail

getAllInstanceFieldDescriptions

public FieldDescription[] getAllInstanceFieldDescriptions()
Gets all the instance fields in the entire class hierarchy extended by the wrapped object.

Returns:
a description of each instance field in the class hierarchy extended by the wrapped object (final fields are not excluded, even though setValue(FieldDescription, Object) can be attempted with such descriptions)

getValue

public Object getValue(FieldDescription description)
                throws ClassNotFoundException,
                       NoSuchFieldException,
                       IllegalAccessException
Gets the value of the field matching the given description on the wrapped object.

Parameters:
description - the description of the field
Returns:
the value of the field from the wrapped object
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - if the Class named by FieldDescription.getDeclaringClassName() cannot be found by the ClassLoader selected by FieldReflector(Object) or injected through FieldReflector(Object, ClassLoader)
NoSuchFieldException - if the field named by FieldDescription.getFieldName() does not exist on the Class named by FieldDescription.getDeclaringClassName() or the Class named by FieldDescription.getDeclaringClassName() is not in the wrapped object's class hierarchy
IllegalAccessException - if the installed Security Manager does not allow access to the field

setValue

public void setValue(FieldDescription description,
                     Object fieldValue)
              throws ClassNotFoundException,
                     NoSuchFieldException,
                     IllegalAccessException
Sets the value of the field matching the given description on the wrapped object.

Parameters:
description - the description of the field to set
fieldValue - the value to set
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - if the Class named by FieldDescription.getDeclaringClassName() cannot be found by the ClassLoader selected by FieldReflector(Object) or injected through FieldReflector(Object, ClassLoader)
NoSuchFieldException - if the field named by FieldDescription.getFieldName() does not exist on the Class named by FieldDescription.getDeclaringClassName() or the Class named by FieldDescription.getDeclaringClassName() is not in the wrapped object's class hierarchy
IllegalAccessException - if the installed Security Manager does not allow access to the field
